edu.cscc.javaadventure

Class Party

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cscc.javaadventure.Party

  • public class Party
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a party of adventures in the JavaAdventure game. Party can add, remove, find, and get members, as well as determining the size of the party. Party members must have unique names.

    • Method Detail

      • addMember

        public void addMember(Character character)
        Adds a character as a member. Character will not be added if it is not unique.
        Parameters:
        character - The Character to be added.

      • onAddPartyMember

        public void onAddPartyMember(AddPartyMemberEventHandler addPartyMemberEventHandler)
        Set the listener for adding a party member.
        Parameters:
        addPartyMemberEventHandler - AddPartyMemberEventHandler instance to listen for member additions.

      • removeMember

        public Character removeMember(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a member by name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the member.
        Returns:
        The removed member, or null if they are not in the party.

      • onRemovePartyMember

        public void onRemovePartyMember(RemovePartyMemberEventHandler removePartyMemberEventHandler)
        Set the listener for removing a party member.
        Parameters:
        removePartyMemberEventHandler - RemovePartyMemberEventHandler instance to listen for member removals.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the count of party members.
        Returns:
        The number of members in the party.

      • findMember

        public Character findMember(java.lang.String name)
        Find a member by name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the member to find.
        Returns:
        The found member, or null if they could not be found.

      • getMembers

        public java.util.List<Character> getMembers()
        Get the members of the party as a list.
        Returns:
        A List of Characters who are members of the party.

      • onMemberTake

        public void onMemberTake(MemberTakeHandler memberTakeHandler)
        Sets the listener for members taking an object.
        Parameters:
        memberTakeHandler - MemberTakeHandler handler.

      • memberTake

        public void memberTake(java.lang.String memberName,
                       JAObject target)
        Invoke the MemberTakeHandler call to allow a member to take an object.
        Parameters:
        memberName - The name of the member to take the object.
        target - The target object to be taken.
